title: Tokyo Majin Gakuen Kenpuchou
alternative_title: 東京魔人學園剣風帖　龖（トウ）
description: In the night of Tokyo, mysterious deaths involving the ‘Reborn Dead’ occur. Mysterious transfer student, Tatsuma Hiyuu, and delinquent student, Kyouichi Houraiji, fight these undead every night. They, along with the rest of their group, soon realize that a greater threat, that involves even more powerful demons, is near.
genre: [<Genre -> Action>, <Genre -> Drama>, <Genre -> Fantasy>, <Genre -> Horror>, <Genre -> Martial Arts>, <Genre -> School>, <Genre -> Supernatural>]
